definition: A term commonly employed to describe the period of time that has elapsed between two specific events or points in time. It is frequently used to indicate the passage of time or to express a change or development that has occurred during an intervening period.

examples.german: Inzwischen habe ich genug Geld gespart.
examples.english: In the meantime, I have saved enough money.
A lot has changed in the meantime.
By now, I am healthy again.

examples.german: Inzwischen haben wir das Problem gelöst.
examples.english: We have solved the problem by now.
